mapper.select: select s.id, s.ms_name, s.ms_type, s.ms_desc, s.ms_parameter, s.create_time, s.modify_time, s.lab_id, s.simulate_ms_type, l.lab_name from t_dl_media_source s left join t_dl_lab l on s.lab_id = l.id

select s.id, s.ms_name, s.ms_type, s.ms_desc, s.ms_parameter, s.create_time, s.modify_time, s.lab_id, s.simulate_ms_type, l.lab_name from t_dl_media_source s left join t_dl_lab l on s.lab_id = l.id where 1=1
and s.ms_type in
#{i}
and s.ms_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{mediaSourceName}),'%')
and s.ms_parameter LIKE concat(concat('%',#{mediaSourceIp}),'%')

select s.id, s.ms_name, s.ms_type, s.ms_desc, s.ms_parameter, s.create_time, s.modify_time, s.lab_id, s.simulate_ms_type, l.lab_name from t_dl_media_source s left join t_dl_lab l on s.lab_id = l.id where s.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_dl_media_source (ms_name,ms_type,ms_desc,ms_parameter,create_time,modify_time,lab_id,simulate_ms_type) VALUES (#{name}, #{type}, #{desc},#{parameter}, now(), now(),#{labId},#{simulateMsType})
mapper.update: update t_dl_media_source set ms_name=#{name}, ms_type=#{type}, ms_desc=#{desc}, ms_parameter=#{parameter}, modify_time = now(), lab_id=#{labId}, simulate_ms_type=#{simulateMsType} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT ms_type AS type, COUNT(1) AS countByType FROM t_dl_media_source GROUP BY ms_type

select s.id, s.ms_name, s.ms_type, s.ms_desc, s.ms_parameter, s.create_time, s.modify_time, s.lab_id from t_dl_media_source s left join t_dl_mediasource_relation r on s.id = r.real_ms_id where r.virtual_ms_id = #{virtualMsId}

select s.id, s.ms_name, s.ms_type, s.ms_desc, s.ms_parameter, s.create_time, s.modify_time, s.lab_id from t_dl_media_source s left join t_dl_mediasource_relation r on s.id = r.real_ms_id left join t_dl_lab l on l.id = s.lab_id where r.virtual_ms_id = #{virtualMsId} and l.lab_name = #{labName}

select id, ms_name, ms_type, ms_desc, ms_parameter, create_time, modify_time, lab_id from t_dl_media_source where ms_name in
#{item}
select from t_dl_media_source where ms_parameter like concat('%',#{likeTargetNamespace},'%')
